name: Pridon Tetradze
title: Software Developer
about: > Generate a short 'about me' paragraph here that makes me look like a great professional. Make sure to mention I'm a development team lead and a psychology graduate. Use words like 'expert', 'enterprise-level', 'fast and efficient', 'client-oriented solutions' etc.

experience.title: Development Team Lead
description: Lead a team of developers in building and maintaining the eToro platform.
Collaborated with other teams to deliver features and fix bugs.
Planned and executed the development of several successful A/B tests that became integral parts of the platform, such as: Comparison charts, user page video bio system, trading notifications, etc.
Maintained and improved the eToro Watchlist which was under our ownership.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Worked on improving and maintaining one of the world’s leading broker platforms.
Worked back-to-back with the designers, product managers, and analysts to deliver new features.
Delivered impactful A/B tests, neatly measured with analytics.
Developed extensible libraries used throughout the whole project.
Architected the front-end of "Academy Lite", an interactive learning app for eToro.

experience.title: Front-end Architect
description: Architecting the front-end of the large scale learning management system.
Administering Angular libraries with Nx.
Implementing custom text editor library and its plugin management system with advanced usage of Angular directives and dependency injection.
Ensuring the team is well informed and coordinated to deliver new features and fix bugs.
Ensuring the quality of the code infrastructure with thorough code reviews

experience.title: Lecturer
description: Taught the fundamentals of front-end development.
Worked closely with the management to improve the teaching process.
Completely revamped the front-end syllabus based on modern technological trends and demands.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
description: Maintained a monolith Ecommerce app “CommerceOS”.
Worked on several apps simultaneously.
Documented the entire project architecture.

experience.title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Developed a campaign management system "Insight Shell" for banks.
Built custom libraries.
Implemented semantic versioning and changelog generator.

projects.name: iswavle.com
projects.description: A project aimed at providing high-quality web development knowledge in Georgian. This is by far the most comprehensive resource on web development in Georgian. Technically, it features static content generation, recursive tree structures in navigation, webcontainers for code editing playground, super-reactive UI and more.

projects.name: NG GUIDE
projects.description: The unofficial Georgian Angular guide book. As a professional lecturer, I compiled extensive Georgian resources for Angular framework and made them freely available. This is the most extensive Georgian resource on Angular to date.

projects.name: EverREST
projects.description: A full-featured public REST API for anyone who wants to practice building web applications. It features a shopping system with authentication as well as smaller and simpler APIs such as QR code generator, quote generator, echo etc.

projects.name: Primordial Soup
projects.description: Personal academic platform where I publish articles and video essays exploring psychology, philosophy, and cognitive science for a general audience.

education.degree: Master's Degree in Human Resource Management (in progress)
education.institution: Sulkhan-Saba Orbeliani University, Faculty of Business and Technologies
education.description: Focused on studying human resource management, organizational behavior, and leadership.

education.institution: Ivane Javakhishvili Tbilisi State University, Faculty of Psychology and Education
education.description: Focused on cognitive psychology, psychoanalytic theory, set psychology.

skills.Frontend: Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, RxJS, HTML5, CSS3, Nx, 11ty
